title: Assess Impact of New Global Regulation
description: A new regulation regarding medical device software has been published in the EU. A regulatory specialist must assess its impact.

tasks.description: Retrieve the full text of the new regulation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent downloads the official text of the new regulation.

tasks.description: Identify which of the company's products are affected by the new regulation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent searches the product database and identifies three software-as-a-medical-device (SaMD) products sold in the EU.

tasks.description: Create a gap analysis comparing the new requirements to the current product documentation and processes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a report highlighting the gaps, such as a need for enhanced cybersecurity documentation.

tasks.description: Create a remediation plan with tasks and timelines to address the gaps.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent develops a project plan to bring the affected products into compliance.
